update_plan.update_summary: The change adds metadata for tracking purposes, processes examples across 4 categories, and modifies/adds data related to AI integration, testing, data pipeline, and trading. Therefore, the README.md, master_blueprint.md, and current_status.json need updates.
key_changes: Addition of metadata for tracking purposes
Modification/addition of data related to AI integration, testing, data pipeline, and trading

specific_updates.README.md: Update the README.md to reflect the new changes, explaining the purpose and effects of the metadata added, the processing of examples across 4 categories, and modifications/additions made to data related to AI integration, testing, data pipeline, and trading.
specific_updates.master_blueprint.md: Revise the master_blueprint.md to include the updated component (Training Summary File) and its role in the system.
specific_updates.current_status.json: Update the current_status.json with the latest changes made to the Training Summary File
